extendedInfo.description: Sabbath School Quarterly app allows you to take your Seventh-Day Adventist Biblical studies wherever you bring your phone. Most Seventh-Day Adventist churches teach on the same topic or reading in a given week, as each quarter of the year has a different theme that reflects Bible, doctrinal, or church lifestyle teachings. Thus the lesson booklet is called quarterly.This app provides you with all of the Sabbath School quarterlies for the current and previous three quarters. It lets you take notes, and it remembers the notes for later when you are taking part in the discussion during Sabbath school. The app allows you to hone in on the specific week and day of study and enables you to move from one day to another with a tap or swipe of your finger.If you need offline bible support or KJV, please install my bible app.The android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED permission is for the read notification feature.The SDA Sabbath School Quarterly App is an independent ministry that supports the mission of the Seventh-day AdventistÂ® Church; however, it is not part of, affiliated with, or supported by the General Conference of Seventh-day AdventistsÂ® headquartered in Silver Spring, Maryland or any of its affiliates known as the Seventh-day Adventist Â® Church.  Thus, any content or opinions expressed, implied or included beyond that included in the Seventh-day Adventist Quarterly are solely those of the creators or owners of the SDA Sabbath School Quarterly App and not those of the General Conference or the Seventh-day AdventistÂ® Church.SDA Seventh-day adventist Sabbath School Quarterly.IASD Iglesia Adventista del Septimo Dia Escuela SabÃ¡tica.

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: This application is very useful to me since I\'m living in a small city in Korea where there is no access for English quarterly lesson. This is the only one im using. As of now I\'m rating it 4 stars. But if you could update it wherein we can highlight or underline important points then I\'ll give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Lilin Mapiga

reviews.title: Inspirational
reviews.comment: Thank you for taking the time to make devotion time mobile. With most people commuting to work, this app makes it easier to study vs. a paper lesson and Bible.
reviews.author: Niecey Starks

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I hope and pray that this app will continue develop or continue this app. very friendly! i enjoy reading this.
reviews.author: John Regodon

reviews.title: Wonderful app for Bible Study
reviews.comment: I appreciate the work that Stefan has done to make this app possible. This app makes it possible for us to study wherever we may be. To God be the glory.
reviews.author: William Ellerbe

reviews.title: Excellent I love it
reviews.comment: No regret for downloading it,it really helps to grow spiritually.May God be with those who contributed there Knowledge to make this possible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app missing configuration options
reviews.comment: Not sure is just me but I can\'t find a configuration button. I thought one could choose the language.
reviews.author: Vinibene C

reviews.title: Its very nice...
reviews.comment: Helps my Sabbath school easy....
reviews.author: Shamini Carmal

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: thank you so much for the updates.. continue this work for the glory of God
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: A beautiful job done good. One thing though, I notice that your preferred Bible text provided in the lesson are from NKJV, but the downloaded Bible that goes with the lesson is KJV.  We all know the KJV English is not the best if one is to understand the verse(s). Why cant you developers give us the readers the option to chose the version(s) we prefer. I am forced yo have two Bible version on my phone, too much memory usage. My name is not Clinton Okemwa, where it came from, I don\'t know.
reviews.author: Henry Onserio

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: This app is a great blessing for those who want to use it. I\'d give it five stars if you could search anywhere in the Bible within the app (sometimes the scripture links takes you to the wrong place, i.e. John 2:1 instead of 1 John 2:1) and if you can add a Spanish Bible (since it has the lessons in Spanish). Love that you can read past quarterlies and that all the quarterly\'s lessons are available at once.
reviews.author: Gerson Tavarez

reviews.title: Best app ever...if...
reviews.comment: Should let use other Bible apps to read texts ( you version, for example. My favorite) An option to highlight, copy and paste, and share would be nice
reviews.author: Orlando Ortega

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Very good application even when at school I can study my lesson.God bless.

reviews.title: Great Took to stay Connected to the Word
reviews.comment: I use this app daily...great way to be able to study the Word of God anywhere!

reviews.title: Exellent App
reviews.comment: This is THE best Escuela Sabatica App. You can read even if there is no internet available. La puedes leer en Espa\303\261ol tambien. Estoy muy satisfecho y la uso todos los dias. Just one sugestion if you could modify this app so you could choose any of the Bible app that you have on your phone instead of the only one choice that you provide. I want to link it to my spanish bible app. Thanks.

reviews.comment: Excellent app. I like that it has bible integration and I am able to add comments.

reviews.comment: this app is quite helpful since its portable
